Class UpdateCustomerScreen

java.lang.Object
controller.UpdateCustomerScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class UpdateCustomerScreen extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
A controller class for updating a customer.
